frame.name: Controller_object
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains items which, when manipulated, alter the function of some device, internal or external.
<ex>This <fex name="Control"><t>button</t></fex> <fex name="Use">makes the radio turn on</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Control
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the entity or substance that is designed to have a particular <fen>Use</fen>. This is often an incorporated FE.</def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition: <def-root>The use for which an control is intended. <ex><t>knob</t> <fex name="Use">for volume control</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Creator
FE.definition: <def-root>An individual or individuals that bring the <fen>Control</fen> into existence.</def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_creation
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which an <fen>Control</fen> comes into existence.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>The term used to refer to an <fen>Control</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>An indication of the subtype of <fen>Artifact</fen>.
<ex>Flip the <fex name="Type">three-way</fex> <t>switch</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Material
FE.definition: <def-root>Any indication of what makes up the <fen>Control</fen>, including components, ingredients, etc.</def-root>

FE.name: Controlled_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity which the <fen>Control</fen> controls. <ex>The <fex name="Controlled_entity">radio</fex> <t>knob</t> was broken.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: button.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: An object, physical or digital, which is maniplulated (by pressing or clicking) in order to bring about some change in a device or program.

lexUnit.name: board.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A device containing electrical switches and other controls and designed to control lights, sound, telephone connections, etc.

lexUnit.name: knob.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A protruding, often round object connected to some larger entity which, when rotated, causes a change in the entity.

lexUnit.name: switch.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: An object that typically has only two modes (on/off) and is manipulated to alter a state in an entity.

lexUnit.name: control.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a device used for guiding a machine

lexUnit.name: switchboard.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A device that directs electricity from one source to another.
